headline: Jim Cramer Says LyondellBasell Industries N.V. (LYB) Performs Well During Strong Economic Periods But Struggles During Downturns
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 8 Stocks on Jim Cramer’s Radar. In this article, we are going to take a look at where LyondellBasell Industries N.V. (NYSE:LYB) stands against the other stocks. Jim Cramer, the host of Mad Money, recently shared some investment guidelines based on his 40 years of experience. As we previously […]
